column1: This is a list of municipalities in France having standing links to local communities in other countries (or in other parts of France). In most cases
column3: especially when formalised by local government
column4: is known as "town twinning" (though other terms
column5: such as "partner towns" or "sister cities" are sometimes used instead)
column6: and while most of the places included are towns

column1: Cissé is a member of the Charter of European Rural Communities
column2: a town twinning association across the European Union

column1: Granville is a member of the Douzelage
column2: a town twinning association of towns across the European Union
